app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at http://www.mdpi.com/1424-8220/18/8/2584/s1, Figure S1: The acquired potentiometric data of the developed potentiometric e-Tongue array in artificial wine solutions with different faults compounds: (A) benzaldehyde, BA; (B) acetic acid, AA; (C) isoamyl alcohol, IA; (D) methionol, ME., Figure S2: The potentiometric response of potentiometric e-Tongue in real Negroamaro wine doped with fault compounds.
